content.text:
All 40 smoke tests passed. Here's the full breakdown:

---

## Smoke Test Results

**40/40 passed** across 2 browsers (desktop-chrome, mobile-android) in 22.9s

### Navigation (`tests/smoke/navigation.spec.ts`)
| Test | desktop-chrome | mobile-android |
|------|---------------|----------------|
| should load home page | ✓ | ✓ |
| should navigate to transactions | ✓ | ✓ |
| should navigate to agent | ✓ | ✓ |
| should navigate to settings | ✓ | ✓ |
| should display all nav items | ✓ | ✓ |

### Stitch Design (`tests/smoke/stitch-design.spec.ts`)

**Home Page Elements**
- should display spending insight card ✓ (both)
- should display quick action buttons ✓ (both)
- should display members section ✓ (both)
- should display recent activity section ✓ (both)

**Transactions Page Elements**
- should display month selector ✓ (both)
- should display summary stats ✓ (both)
- should display empty state with CTA ✓ (both)

**Agent Page Elements**
- should display agent tabs ✓ (both)
- should display smart input ✓ (both)
- should display example prompts ✓ (both)
- should display parse button disabled initially ✓ (both)

**Settings Page Elements**
- should display pot settings section ✓ (both)
- should display data management section ✓ (both)
- should display coming soon features ✓ (both)
- should display dark mode toggle ✓ (both)

---

## Status
DONE

## What Changed
- No files changed — read-only test run

## Key Decisions
- None required; all tests passed cleanly

## PR / Branch
- None created
